backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report listing files and components involved in implementing manual task creation with energy-category selection.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style text describing summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining light/dark themes, colors, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskModal.tsx: Modal for manually adding tasks with fields for title, why, energy category, steps, and estimated time.
frontend/src/components/BrainDumpView.ts: Brain Dump tool that extracts tasks, classifies energy categories, supports editing, voice input, and adding items to backlog.
frontend/src/components/EnergyCategorySe: UI component rendering selectable energy category cards using provided metadata.
Button returning users to the main focus view.
frontend/src/components/TaskEnergyAssist: A chat-style component that classifies user-described tasks into energy categories and displays assistant suggestions.
frontend/src/FocusExecutionApp.jsx: Main application managing tasks, energy state, views, timers, brain dump, and modal flows including AddTaskModal.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for handling Internet Identity login, identity loading, and auth-client lifecycle management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements a browser speech‑to‑text hook using Web Speech API with listening state, error handling, and transcript management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, fonts, Tailwind layers, color variables, and custom warm-themed utility classes and animations.
Parses freeform text into discrete tasks using heuristics for bullets, lists, separators, and multi-part sentences.
frontend/src/lib/taskEnergyClassifier.ts: Implements a deterministic keyword- and pattern-based classifier that assigns an energy category to a task with confidence and explanation. Includes scoring logic using keywords, complexity, and time estimates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, rendering the main App component. Sets up the root element and global providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, shadows, animations, and container settings. Extends theme tokens and registers typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, architecture, features, and known issues for a React-based focus and task management system. Includes schema versioning and detailed notes on storage, UI, and AI-assisted task parsing.
